snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga and Richard Gasquet put France back in the Davis Cup finals on Saturday by winning the doubles and ending the two-year reign of the Czech Republic.
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga and Richard Gasquet put France back in the Davis Cup finals on Saturday by winning the doubles and ending the two-year reign of the Czech Republic.

headline.main: France Advances to Davis Cup Finals
headline.print_headline: France Advances to Davis Cup Finals
